Gargoyles can be assigned as a slayer task at level 75 Slayer, level 80 combat, and with completion of the Priest in Peril quest by various slayer masters. They are only found in the Slayer Tower, either in the top floor or in the basement. The gargoyles in the basement of the Slayer Tower can only be killed while on a Slayer task, as Raulyn will stop the player if they attempt to fight them off-task. Gargoyles have a Superior slayer monster variant, the level 349 Marble gargoyle. Gargoyles also have a chance to drop the Brittle key, which gives access to the Grotesque Guardians at the top of the Slayer Tower, a boss variant of the monster.

In order to kill a gargoyle, a rock hammer, a rock thrownhammer or a granite hammer must be used when they reach 9 or lower Hitpoints. Normally, the item must be used on the gargoyle, but players can buy the "Gargoyle Smasher" perk from Slayer masters for 120 Slayer points, which will automatically smash the gargoyle when it falls to 9 or lower Hitpoints, provided that the player has a rock hammer (or equivalent) in their inventory. The granite hammer will automatically smash gargoyles even without the perk if it is equipped.

Common Setups[edit | edit source]

As Gargoyles are weak to crush, many players bring a crush-focused weapon such as the Sarachnis cudgel for this task.

Praying Protect from Melee will negate all damage from regular gargoyles. However, if players have Bigger and badder unlocked they may have to fight Marble gargoyles. These superior variants use both melee and ranged attack styles. Players can either continue praying protect from melee and bring food to heal damage done by the Marble gargoyle's ranged attacks, or bring a ranged switch and pray ranged to negate all of the Marble gargoyle's damage. The player will still have to dodge the Marble gargoyle's special attack, though.

Slayer Unlocks[edit | edit source]

Main article: Slayer reward point
Unlock Points cost Notes
Gargoyle smasher 120 Gargoyles are automatically dealt the finishing blow if the player has a Rock hammer in their inventory.
Double Trouble 500 Slaying Dusk and Dawn now counts for two kills towards your task rather than one.
Bigger and Badder 150 Increase the risk against certain slayer monsters with the chance of a superior version spawning whilst on a slayer task.
Get smashed 100 Number of gargoyles assigned is increased to 200-250.

Location Maplink Amount Multicombat Cannonable Safespottable Notes

  • Running through the floors of the Slayer Tower takes the player past many other dangerous monsters, most notably Banshees and Aberrant spectres which will lower the player's stats without proper protection.

  • Only available after receiving a Brittle key drop from regular Gargoyles. The roof serves as a boss arena for the Grotesque Guardians.
